Below is a list of things I've written so far:


```{python}
#| output: asis
import os
from pathlib import Path
import datetime

def find_cdb_dir():
    qproj = os.getenv("QUARTO_PROJECT_DIR")
    if qproj:
        p = Path(qproj) / "blog"
        if p.is_dir():
            return p
    cwd = Path.cwd()
    if cwd.name.lower() == "blog":
        return cwd
    p = cwd / "blog"
    if p.is_dir():
        return p
    for candidate in cwd.glob("**/blog"):
        if any(candidate.glob("blog_*.qmd")):
            return candidate
    raise FileNotFoundError("Could not locate the 'blog' folder.")

cdb_dir = find_cdb_dir()

files = sorted(
    [f for f in cdb_dir.glob("blog_*.qmd") if f.is_file()],
    reverse=True
)

if not files:
    print("No blogs available yet.")
else:
    print("| Date | Link |")
    print("|------|------|")
    for f in files:
        date_str = f.stem.replace("blog_", "")
        display = datetime.datetime.strptime(date_str, "%Y-%m-%d").strftime("%b %d, %Y")
        rel_link = f.name.replace(".qmd", ".html")
        print(f"| {display} | [View Brief]({rel_link}) |")

```
